testCase.name: characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters
characters-api getCharacterById should return the correct character when a valid ID is provided
characters-api getCharacterById should throw an error when character with provided ID does not exist
NumberOfCharacters component renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
NumberOfCharacters component renders "There is 1 character" when characters array has one character
NumberOfCharacters component renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
CharactersList component La liste est vide
CharactersList component Affiche tous les personnages passés en paramètre
CharacterDetail component affiche les informations et l'image quand le thumbnail existe
CharacterDetail component n'affiche pas d'image quand il n'y a pas de thumbnail
